description: High-Definition Multimedia Interface (HDMI), the future of HDTV, enables delivery of both high-definition video and multichannel, digital audio through just one cable.  It offers an ideal way to connect digital displays such as HDTVs, plasma displays, DLP TVs, LCD TVs, and projectors.  HDMI also provides an all-digital connection between such source devices as HDTVs, DVD players/recorders, digital cable/satellite boxes, and AV receivers.
title: Premium HDMI v1.3 Cable (2M/6ft.) (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
